ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: My guess, and it ties into the Burynai Bunt Cake quest that we haven t figgered out yet, is that the helm that Treekill gives as the reward is the Singing
ygData.messageBody:
My guess, and it ties into the Burynai Bunt Cake quest that we haven't
figgered out yet, is that the helm that Treekill gives as the reward is the
Singing Steel Helm. His talk says that he got it from a bard, that the helm
is only usable by bards, and that the bard said it came from Sebilis where
all of the class helms are coming from that I know of.
If the quest for the cake turns out to be quite elaborate and time
consuming then I can see Verant putting this as the reward.

But what would be the effect?

We are already getting air from our gloves... (suck on my thumb to
breathe...)

We are already getting water from our boots... (Anyone for boot water?)

We are already getting food from our pants... (... not touching that
one... )

Any ideas?

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 10, 2000 4:36 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


so far the only pieces found are gloves, boots, and legs. there is only one
set of legs (on any server) because we were able to kill venril sathir
before he was buffed incredibly (apparently he is a quest npc and not to be
killed), and now his loot table is most likely empty. so we have gloves and
boots. every other class with kunark armor has found one or all of the
following, and this includes druid, ranger, shadow knight, paladin, warrior,
rogue, shaman, cleric: arms, helm, bracer. none of these have been found in
singing steel. i refuse to believe they have not been found yet. every
other class with armor in kunark has found these pieces! maybe bards get
lucky and our pieces are so incredible they are found only in veeshan's peak
(laugh). so what i think is that once again, like imbrued armor in hate,
bard armor has been forgotten to be placed in kunark. anyone who is more
familiar and versed want to ask on the gameplay forum? or am i wrong?

Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel (54.5)
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
